sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useDropzone } from 'react-dropzone'; import { Box, Button, Text, Input, VStack, Icon } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { FiUpload, FiList, FiCamera, FiDatabase, FiBarChart, FiLayers, FiPlay, FiRepeat } from 'react-icons/fi'; const LiveStock = () => { const [prediction, setPrediction] = useState(null); const [classification, setClassification] = useState(null); const { getRootProps, getInputProps, isDragActive } = useDropzone({ accept: 'image/*,video/*', onDrop: (acceptedFiles) => { console.log(acceptedFiles); const mockPrediction = "Foot-and-Mouth Disease"; const mockClassification = "Classified as Severe"; setPrediction(mockPrediction); setClassification(mockClassification); } }); return ( {/* Sidebar */} Livestock_disease_classification Classification {/* Main Content */} {isDragActive ? ( Drop the files here... ) : ( Drag and drop to upload, or: )} Supported Formats: Images (jpg, png, etc.), Annotations, Videos (mov, mp4) {prediction && ( Predicted Disease: {prediction} )} {classification && ( Classification: {classification} )} ); }; export default LiveStock;
